item.title: Eel populations are falling, and new protections were defeated. Japan and the US opposed them
item.description: Valuable eels are in decline all over the world, leading to a new push for restrictions on trade to try to help stave off extinction

item.title: Armani fashion group appoints new board to guide company after designer's death

item.title: World shares are mixed in holiday-thinned trading with Wall Street closed for Thanksgiving
item.description: World shares are mixed in holiday-thinned trading as tech stocks slipped after a recent rebound lost steam

item.title: Here's what to know about the federal ban threatening the market for THC-infused drinks and snacks
item.description: THC-infused drinks and snacks have soared in popularity as alcohol sales have declined in recent years

item.title: Kenyan court declares law banning seed sharing unconstitutional
item.description: A high court in Kenya has declared unconstitutional sections of a seed law that prevented farmers from sharing and selling indigenous seeds in what fo...
